concept_name: How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day
instrument: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test - Consumption [AUDIT-C]
answers: Patient does not drink, 1 or 2, 3 or 4, 5 or 6, 7 to 9, 10 or more, Patient unable to answer, Patient refused / declined

concept_name: How often do you have 6 or more drinks on 1 occasion
instrument: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test - Consumption [AUDIT-C]
answers: Never, Less than monthly, Monthly, Weekly, Daily or almost daily, Patient unable to answer, Patient refused / declined

concept_name: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol
instrument: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test - Consumption [AUDIT-C]
answers: Never, Monthly or less, 2-4 time a month, 2-3 times a week, 4 or more times a week, Patient unable to answer, Patient refused / declined
